#include<iostream>

#include<stdio.h>

#define DIV 10000

 

using namespace std;

 

typedef int Lint;

 

Lint calcVal( Lint n ) {
	

	Lint i = 1, j = 1, *A;

	A = new Lint[ n + 1 ];

	A[ 1 ] = 1;

 

	for( i = 2;i <= n;i++ ) {
		

		A[ i ] = 0;

		for( j = 1; j < i;j++ )

			A[ i ] = ( A[ i ] + ( ( A[ j ] * A[ i - j ] ) % DIV ) ) % DIV;	

	} 

 

	return A[ n ];

}

 

int main() {
	

	Lint t, n;

 

	scanf("%d", &t );
	

	while( t-- ) {
				

		scanf("%d", &n );

		printf( "%d\n", calcVal( n ) ); 

	}

 

	return 0;}
